meanings.definition: Bops (verb): to hit or strike someone or something
meanings.sent1: He bops the ball with his hand.
meanings.sent2: She bops the drum to make music.
meanings.sent3: The cat bops the toy mouse playfully.
meanings.sent4: The wind bops the branches against the window.
meanings.sent5: The hammer bops the nail into the wood.

meanings.definition: Bops (noun): a catchy and upbeat song
meanings.sent1: They dance to the bops at the party.
meanings.sent2: The radio plays popular bops all day.
meanings.sent3: The bops make everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent4: Her favorite bop always cheers her up.
meanings.sent5: The bop's melody stays in your head all day.

meanings.definition: Bops (adjective): used to describe something that is cool or impressive
meanings.sent1: That skateboard trick was so bops!
meanings.sent2: She has a bops collection of stickers.
meanings.sent3: His bops dance moves amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: The sunset was truly bops in its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The new video game is bops with its graphics.
